itemLabel: Robert Walker, Baron Walker of Gestingthorpe

wikipedia_page.main: Robert Walker, Baron Walker of Gestingthorpe, ,  (born 17 March 1938) is an English barrister and former Justice of the Supreme Court of the United Kingdom. He also serves as a Non-Permanent Judge of the Hong Kong Court of Final Appeal.He sat in the House of Lords as a crossbencher until his retirement from the House on 17 March 2021.

response: *Robert Walker, Baron Walker of Gestingthorpe (born 1938), British law lord and Lord of Appeal in Ordinary
